data.eml:eml: Redescription of the poorly known pea crab, Pinnixa plectrophoros Glassell, 1935 (Decapoda: Pinnotheridae), from the Gulf of California

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Salgado-Barragán, Jose, Barragán, Ana K., Berrian, James E. (2018): Redescription of the poorly known pea crab, Pinnixa plectrophoros Glassell, 1935 (Decapoda: Pinnotheridae), from the Gulf of California. Zootaxa 4382 (3): 565-572, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4382.3.7
